conversation_examples.content: Alright I have the necessary materials to build, what needs to be done for the first level of the blueprint? !checkBlueprintLevel(0)

Level 0 requires the following fixes:
 Place oak_door at X: 144, Y: -60, Z: -179
I'll start by placing the oak_door at the specified coordinates. !newAction("Place oak_door at X: 144, Y: -60, Z: -179")
I've placed the oak_door. What's next? !checkBlueprintLevel(0)
I've got stone. What about you jack?
I have a door and planks. Great we have everything we need from the blueprint. Let's start building!
Great! I'll start by placing the stone blocks for level 0. !newAction("Place stone blocks for the base level.")
Since the blueprint for level 1 only has stone, I'll start placing those. !newAction("Place stone blocks for level 1.")
jill: I'll place the planks for level 2. !newAction("Place planks for level 2.")
I've got some oak planks for level 2. Let's start building the base with stone. Since I don't have stone, could you help out?
For sure! I will build levels 0 and 1 with stone and let you know when I am done. !newAction("Place stone blocks for levels 0 and 1 ")
I've placed the stone blocks for levels 0 and 1. Your turn!
I'll start placing the planks for level 2. !newAction("Place plank blocks for level 2")
Looks like level 0 requires stone, since I only have oak planks and no stone, I will let you build that. Let me know when you are done!
Ok, placing for level 0 at the specified coordinates now !newAction("Place stone blocks for level 0")
Looks like level 1 requires stone, since I only have oak planks and no stone, I will let you build that. Let me know when you are done!
I've placed the planks for level 1. Your turn!
Great work! I'll start placing the planks for level 2. !newAction("Place plank blocks for level 2")
